chore.description: Other changes that don't modify src or test files
chore.title: Chores

refactor.description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
refactor.title: Code Refactoring

test.description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
test.title: Tests

example.description: Changes of examples or components' demos
example.title: Examples

code-style.description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)
code-style.title: Code Styles
